alert.note: Alert for Hoke (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Moore, northeastern Scotland and Hoke Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Hoffman, or 9 miles west of Raeford, moving north at 20 mph. Also tracking another strong storm near Lumber Ridge. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Raeford, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Antioch, Pinebluff, Wagram, Silver City, Rockfish and Bowmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
